roleset.name: a meeting of local members of a political party

example.name: Typical eventive usage, almost a light verb
example.text: His nomination was voted at a caucus of state delegates at the midyear meeting of the American Bar Association

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01 part 4. Framed by Claire

predicate.note: Be careful to distinguish eventive meetings from references to the physical group denoted by the name of the caucus, e.g. The National Caucus of Environmental Legislators is a non-profit organization...
